update ml_natural_credit_info
APP_NO = #{record.appNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
HAS_CREDIT_INFO = #{record.hasCreditInfo,jdbcType=CHAR},
CC_COUNT = #{record.ccCount,jdbcType=INTEGER},
NEW_CC_IN3MTH = #{record.newCcIn3mth,jdbcType=INTEGER},
LAST_ACTIVE_CC_COUNT = #{record.lastActiveCcCount,jdbcType=INTEGER},

CC_M0_IN3MTH = #{record.ccM0In3mth,jdbcType=INTEGER},
CC_M1_IN3MTH = #{record.ccM1In3mth,jdbcType=INTEGER},

LOAN_M2M_IN3MTH = #{record.loanM2mIn3mth,jdbcType=INTEGER},
CTRANS_OR_LOAN_IN6MTH = #{record.ctransOrLoanIn6mth,jdbcType=INTEGER},

HIGHEST_DELINQUENCY_CYCLE = #{record.highestDelinquencyCycle,jdbcType=INTEGER},
AMOUNT_OF_DELINQUENCY = #{record.amountOfDelinquency,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
